name: '#1 - KUBERA'
description:
'A BEAUTIFUL LEOPARDESS RETURNS HOME UNDER THE TWINKLING SKY, A REFLECTION OF HER LUXURIOUS, YET HIDDEN COAT.'

6/6 available for 1 $xtz each on @hicetnunc. When you purchase Kubera, you will also receive a private Google Drive link to Section 1/15 of Chapter 1 of 'Leaves in the Wind'. To read the rest of the chapter, be sure to follow us on Twitter, Tiktok, and Instagram @Kristian_Cloud and @BlackbirdIndigo and turn on notifications (you can also contact us on these sites and send proof of your purchase for the link). We'll be releasing 15 NFTs to complete the whole chapter, along with an extra three 3/3 rare edition EarthHeart NFTs. Then, we'll begin chapter two.

We plan to aggressively scale our floor prices so that interested and supporting collectors will be benefitting cumulatively as time passes on.

'Leaves in the Wind' Collection floor price scales:

#1-#5 (1 xtz to 7 xtz)
#6-#10 (7 xtz to 13 xtz)
#11-#15 (13 xtz and up).

Here are two more benefits of collecting EarthHeart NFTs:

1- If you have ever traded a piece in this collection, or had it in your possession, 
you automatically qualify to receive a free copy of the e-book upon the story's completion.

2- If you are still holding an EarthHeart NFT in your wallet 
by the exact time that I have officially finished writing the story, 
you will win an exclusive and signed physical copy of the completed 528-paged space epic, 'Leaves in the Wind'.

Sandbox games and NFTs coming soon.

We hope you enjoy and thank you for co-creating with us!
